ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_0cn | |- 0 e. CC |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( abs o. - ) = ( abs o. - ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_cnmetdval | |- ( ( x e. CC /\ 0 e. CC ) -> ( x ( abs o. - ) 0 ) = ( abs ` ( x - 0 ) ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( x e. CC -> ( x ( abs o. - ) 0 ) = ( abs ` ( x - 0 ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_subid1 | |- ( x e. CC -> ( x - 0 ) = x ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( x e. CC -> ( abs ` ( x - 0 ) ) = ( abs ` x ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( x e. CC -> ( x ( abs o. - ) 0 ) = ( abs ` x ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_mpteq2ia | |- ( x e. CC |-> ( x ( abs o. - ) 0 ) ) = ( x e. CC |-> ( abs ` x ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( norm ` CCfld ) = ( norm ` CCfld ) |
| 10 |  | #P_cnfldbas | |- CC = ( Base ` CCfld ) |
| 11 |  | #P_cnfld0 | |- 0 = ( 0g ` CCfld ) |
| 12 |  | #P_cnfldds | |- ( abs o. - ) = ( dist ` CCfld ) |
| 13 | 9, 10, 11, 12 | #P_nmfval | |- ( norm ` CCfld ) = ( x e. CC |-> ( x ( abs o. - ) 0 ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_absf | |- abs : CC --> RR |
| 15 | 14 | #P_a1i | |- ( T. -> abs : CC --> RR ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_feqmptd | |- ( T. -> abs = ( x e. CC |-> ( abs ` x ) ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_trud | |- abs = ( x e. CC |-> ( abs ` x ) ) |
| 18 | 8, 13, 17 | #P_3eqtr4ri | |- abs = ( norm ` CCfld ) |
